item.title: EP 290 - The Vampire Infestation Of Notting Hill
item.itunes:title: The Vampire Infestation Of Notting Hill
item.description:
Today we learn a popular bully technique can kill, and then we travel to England to witness a terrible crime that was meant to save the world . . .

UFO ROUNDUP

Volume 5

Number 21

May 25, 2000

http://www.ufoinfo.com/roundup/v05/rnd05_21.shtml

 

Cops: Man killed stepfather with "atomic wedgie"

https://www.cbsnews.com/news/cops-man-killed-stepfather-with-atomic-wedgie/

 

Oklahoma 'Atomic wedgie' killer sentenced to 30 years in prison

https://oklahoman.com/article/5434192/oklahoma-atomic-wedgie-killer-sentenced-to-30-years-in-prison

 

He Gave His Dad An ‘Atomic Wedgie’ And He Could Spend The Rest Of His Life In Jail

https://boredomtherapy.com/man-dies-by-atomic-wedgie/

 

Shelley Christopher: Mother killed partner and daughter 'to stop vampires taking over the world', court hears

https://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/crime/shelley-christopher-mother-killed-partner-and-daughter-to-stop-vampires-taking-over-the-world-court-a6701796.html

 

Woman killed partner and child 'to ward off vampires'

https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2015/oct/20/woman-killed-partner-and-child-to-ward-off-vampires
